(1) An inventory and valuation of property shall be carried out by a notary or the executor appointed by the probate court.
(2) An inventory and valuation of property may also be carried out by a court employee appointed by a judge.
(3) An inventory and valuation shall be carried out in the presence of two adults; when necessary, experts shall also take part.
(4) Any person affected may be present at such inventorying and valuation.
